title: CRoT Integrity Monitor (CIM) Operational Parameters
description: Defines the mandatory configuration parameters, thresholds, and reporting pathways for the CRoT Integrity Monitor (CIM), guaranteeing predictable Integrity Halt (IH) behavior.

measurement_intervals_ms.description: Mandatory continuous measurement interval in milliseconds (e.g., 50ms).

entropy_source_path.description: Path to the verified, high-quality entropy source (TRNG/PSM).

integrity_drift_threshold.description: Maximum allowable difference (standard deviations) in runtime checksum before IH warning state.

unauthorized_code_policy.description: Policy action upon detection of execution of code not validated by the TBC.

tvcl_endpoint_uri.description: Secure, authenticated URI for Trust Verifiable Configuration Log (TVCL) data transmission.
